name: Nuclear speed
description:
Endless style game developed in coppercube engine. Drive a car in a post-apocalyptic world, collect the "nuclear items" to extend the time and dodge the war tanks! Try to score the highest score possible!

Game available in two versions:

Default: lightweight to run on any computer

Reshade: With real-time shadows and Reshade effects for better graphics and colors.

controls

AWSD/ arrows to drive
